title: David Bowie has 'retired from touring', says promoter
text: David Bowie has 'retired from touring', says promoter Monday, 12 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) Isle Of Wight Festival promoter David Giddings claims the singer won't tour again David Bowie is absolutely, definitely done with touring. That’s the word from John Giddings, the British concerts veteran who can boast to having...
